data.why:
I'm the maintener of the ENodes project (http://www.enodes.org) and
    would be happy to integrate the core system in the CPAN tree. I
    would like also to put some useful modules i developed during
    different works: - interfaces on Payement systems like Paybox
    (http://www.paybox.com) or SPPLUS (http://www.spplus.net/). -
    interfaces on Infobel (http://www.infobel.com)
